original_text: “Son of man, when the people of Israel were living in their own land, they defiled it by their conduct and their actions. Their conduct was like a woman’s monthly uncleanness in my sight.
korean_text: 인자야 이스라엘 족속이 그들의 고국 땅에 거주할 때에 그들의 행위로 그 땅을 더럽혔나니 나 보기에 그 행위가 월경 중에 있는 여인의 부정함과 같았느니라

sentences.original_text: when the people of Israel were living in their own land
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성이 그들의 땅에 거할 때에

sentences.original_text: they defiled it by their conduct
Their conduct was like a woman's monthly uncleanness
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 행위는 여인의 월경 부정함과 같았으며
